  • Method Details

    • getUser

      public static User getUser()
      Gets the user object for the current session user.
      Returns:
      a user the current session user.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initialize login, gets rb for french if the system language is French. Uses .properties to translate text into appropriate French translation for any user text. Gets the time zone and language and assigns the appropriate labels to the string values for displaying.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • onLogin

      public void onLogin(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      Login button pressed, gather username and password and validate against DB. Loads the main page if successfull, displays error if not.
      Also writes to the login_activity file. Additionally, runs the appointment check function for feedback on possible upcoming appointments for current user.
      Throws:
      SQLException
      IOException

    • mouseOver

      public void mouseOver(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Change color on mouse over.

    • mouseOut

      public void mouseOut(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Change color to default on mouse out.

    • apptLoginCheck

      public void apptLoginCheck()
      Checks for appointments within 15 min (plus or minus) of current system time. If there are appointments they are displayed in an alert. If there aren't an alert indicating there are none is displayed.
